title: <t-lang en>Household Case</t-lang><t-lang fr>Household Case</t-lang>

searchSettings.primaryTemplate: ${searchDoc.variables.status === 'Enrolled' ? `<t-lang en>Participant ID</t-lang><t-lang fr>ID de participant</t-lang>: ${searchDoc.variables.participant_id}       <t-lang en>Enrollment Date</t-lang><t-lang fr>Date de l'inscriptione</t-lang>: ${(searchDoc.variables.enrollment_date).substring(8,10) + '-' + (searchDoc.variables.enrollment_date).substring(5,7)+ '-' + (searchDoc.variables.enrollment_date).substring(0,4)}` : `<t-lang en>Screening ID</t-lang><t-lang fr>ID de dépistage</t-lang>: ${response._id.substr(0,6)}        <t-lang en>Screening Date</t-lang><t-lang fr>Date de dépistage</t-lang>: ${searchDoc.variables.screening_date ? searchDoc.variables.screening_date : 'N/A' }` }
searchSettings.secondaryTemplate: ${searchDoc.variables.status === 'Enrolled' ? `<t-lang en>Name</t-lang><t-lang fr>Nom</t-lang>: ${searchDoc.variables.firstname} ${searchDoc.variables.surname}        Village: ${searchDoc.variables.village}        <t-lang en>Status</t-lang><t-lang fr>Statut</t-lang>: <t-lang en>Enrolled</t-lang><t-lang fr>Inscrite</t-lang>      ` : `<t-lang en>Status</t-lang><t-lang fr>Statut</t-lang>: <t-lang en>Not enrolled</t-lang><t-lang fr>Pas inscrit</t-lang>       ` }

description: <t-lang en>Select this case type to screen a household.</t-lang><t-lang fr>Select this case type to screen a household.</t-lang>
